title: Spiced berry whip

default: 2 free-range egg whites, whisked until soft peaks form

steps: Pour the cordial into a tall glass.
Place the yoghurt, orange zest, double cream, whisked egg whites and meringue into a bowl and mix together.
Spoon the mixture into a piping bag. Dip the piping bag into the cordial at the bottom of the glass and squeeze out the cream mixture all the way up to the top.
Garnish with mint and dust with the icing sugar.
